website_summaries.verdict: This above or below the waterline light is easy to install and has a very small footprint.
pros: Can be surface-mounted or wired above or below the waterline
Made up of six bright green LED lights of 180 lumens each
Doesn't run as hot as other options
cons: Light output is not as good as other options
Reports that some of the LEDs die within a few months

customer_reviews.title: They don't last
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved them... Bright and easy to install. Problem is they don't last. One side made it about 15 months. It still comes on but is very dim. The other after 2.5 years just quit completely. And yes I and check wiring and power with a meter. This is on a lift keep boat in a very clean freshwater lake. Its not like changing a light bulb. The damn things are screwed and caulked to the hull and hard wired in. Hate to buy these again and hope for better results but if I try for a better product I have to drill more hole in the boat. Boats don't like holes................
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Alright
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what all the other buyers were talking about but these suit me just fine. If you expected them to be crazy bright then you should have paid for the more expensive ones and not these. Installed them just below the water line next to my trim tabs. Will definitely purchase 2 more for the middle area of transom to get alittle more water effect while under way. I recommend these for those who dont want to spend over $100 for underwater lights. Update: Purchased 2 more... totally recommended... so far the first 2 lasted me 4 trips out on the water...
customer_reviews.author: H.P

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect and gave enough light to make our vacation perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these hoping that they would be bright enough for the river for some night time swimming. Back of my 20 foot open bow party rocket. They were perfect and gave enough light to make our vacation perfect. Will by more for interior to bring perfect lighting for the inside as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Leaked not very bright even in clear oceanwater.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend. Installed 4 on the transom of my 23 dusky. All 4 leaking within the 1st month of install. Not very bright. Not happy with this product. Now i have 4 holes bellow my water line in the middle of fishing season and i have to return these to get a refund but still have holes in my boat and no lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work and leaks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these lights in late 2018 my boat has only been in the water once since installing in January 2019 went out tonight on my first night boat fishing trip and two of three lights that I had professionally install are leaking and not working so upset the quality is not what I expected ,I guess u get what u pay for with the priced I paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: All ready blown due to water leaking into housing. Not isolated as both lights I bought have water in them.
customer_reviews.author: leanna mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and lights up back of boat well. COOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: I am super pleased they are extremely bright and work very well ...
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased they are extremely bright and work very well they Do exactly what they said they were supposed toI still cannot get over how great and how well they work
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Switches stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this switch panel, installed it and a month later about the second time i used it half the switches would not work. Some lights work some dont on the switches. I rechecked all the connections and swapped wires around making sure my electronics where not bad and they worked on other switches.
customer_reviews.author: cody benton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night fishing
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. I have 7, so far, placed at the end of my dock in 5 feet of saltwater. Attracts the small fish that the striped bass feed on. Perfect for night fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Adams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and easy install. Bright lights and no need for large holes.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: These lights will not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4hts of these lights, I have been out in my boat 7 times and only 1 of the 4 lights still work. I would ask for replacements but it has been 2 years. If I get a response I might change my rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as Rigid lights, but a fraction of the price & seals seem to be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: ... OK not quite as bright as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: Work OK not quite as bright as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: This green light is very bright, I mounted on my boat in less than 15 minutes. Added a great look to my boat. Also handles the water very well
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for any boat
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made and so far so good ill keep you updated
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: right light, right price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very bright, installed on my 2006 Tahoe 195 and has not leaked so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wow love it looks so bright and cool in my boat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As it says on the tin...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sailboat. You are not going to light up the entire Marina, but you will get a nice bright glow around these suitable for attracting marine life and also great for illuminating the boarding ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price the lights are a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Pilotofpiper

customer_reviews.title: Leaked fist time I used them
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these. First time I put the boat in the water one filled with water.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Work great! A lot brighter under the water than you ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed through the hull on my 16' boat. Work great! A lot brighter under the water than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Isidro S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installed and it worked. Great product and thanks Amazon for fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Mesina

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping and easy to install but poor light output they barely light the water 3 feet behind the boat
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Mounted to side of boat underneath water ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Mounted to side of boat underneath water line to attract bait fish. Look really nice in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very bright haven't seen it in the water yet hopefully soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: fluffy

customer_reviews.title: great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Could be a bit brighter, but outstanding for the money
customer_reviews.author: Cobrajet 1950

customer_reviews.title: Good light but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little lights. Mounted on back of my bass boat and was surprised at how much light they give off. Be careful when screwing these down, too tight and the glass may crack.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, great!!! Wanted more light but will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to inspect the light once received.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to inspect the item good once you receive it. I ordered 2 of these lights and after I installed them I noticed that one of them had either a manufactures defect or a foreign object inside the lens. I've asked how to contact the seller to let them know about it, but have not received a response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lee Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Dewitt Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are very inexpensive. I mounted 4 of them under my kayak with a small 12v battery. They are a head turner for sure, and great for attracting bait. Excellent visibility. Off the standard 12v battery I would guess they run for about 4-6 hours. Havent has them on long enough.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these for my Jon boat transom to fish at night. Produce a good amount of light. Well packed. Quick shipment. Now to see if they can help me catch fish.
customer_reviews.author: RBW

customer_reviews.title: Very good boat led
customer_reviews.text: This light uses very little energy. I tested with a battery pack and the light is still on after 2 weeks continuous running. I would recommend this light for fishing boats
customer_reviews.author: James Cox

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY BOATER !
customer_reviews.text: i purchased two of these light for my boat ,the light is very good and easy to install, working good .love the product ,very happy with the purchased.
customer_reviews.author: viet 22

customer_reviews.title: great product, and they shine quite a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights were way more than I expected, based off the other reviews! Well worth the money, great product, and they shine quite a bit of light. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Finelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice little light
customer_reviews.text: Nice little light, pretty bright. I should have went ahead and got two but I wanted to try it first. Will get another.
customer_reviews.author: GWP

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: They didn't last longer than an hour before the LEDs started burning out. Must of got a bad batch from china. 600 lumens.....it's more like a hundred. Would work if the LEDs lasted.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2, one for each side. They are much better quality than expected! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: ClarknClairesMomma

customer_reviews.title: Wish the light was brighter
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps should have researched more but was expecting more out of this little guy. Light was true to expected color but didn't cast more than 10-15 feet from the unit. It was easy to install and seemed well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mufasa

customer_reviews.title: Underwater lights
customer_reviews.text: Great for night swimming. Great price. Easy install and tutorial video was very thorough and was very very very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chief A. Todd Holder

product_meta.title: TH Marine LED-51868-DP Underwater Light, Green
product_meta.description: Totally Waterproof High Intensity LED Underwater Lights - Finally, there is an affordable alternative for LED underwater boat lighting. These High-Intensity LED Underwater Lights are totally waterproof and designed to be used above or below the water line. A broad flood light effect is created by the engineered optics of the convex light face. Compared to other LED models on the market, this 180 Lumen light has greater light output and a wider aperture. Proven to attract bait fish to during night trips and add ambiance to any vessel.
feature_bullets: Affordable High-Intensity LED Underwater Light with No high heat like most other underwater lights
Surface Mount or Small Hole for Wiring - Suggested for Above or Below Waterline; Swim Steps, Transoms, Trim-Tabs and T-Tops
6 Super Bright LED's (180 Lumens) Lower amperage draw and longer life than conventional bulbs 100,000 hour life
Dimensions: Surface size: 3.5" x 1.5" Height: 1.2" with mounting spacer or 0.7" without spacer; Stainless Steel Installation Hardware Included
High Intensity Underwater LED Light - 180 Lumens - 6 Green LEDs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
